title: News24.com | I have no money for a ticket home or to stay here much longer, says SA man stuck in Vietnam

content:
Stranded in Vietnam, more than 10 000km from home, SA citizen Craig Jordan doesn't know where next month's rent will come from.
"I am now in a situation where I do not have money to buy a ticket home or money to stay in Vietnam any longer than this month," J… [+3938 chars]
